explains: n. 炮手，枪手；火炮瞄准手；经常投篮的投手

sentences.en: Then came the voice of our nose gunner.
sentences.cn: 这时传来我们的前机枪手的声音。

sentences.en: The gunner tried to bring his guns around.
sentences.cn: 机枪手试图带着他的枪转动。

sentences.en: Nevertheless, with suicidal bravado, he volunteers as a tail gunner.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此，他还是假装着视死如归，志愿成为了一名尾炮手。
